item.title: Percentiles
item.description: Percentiles Percentiles are ubiquitous in application performance monitoring, particularly the 95th (P95), 99th (P99), and 99.9th (P999) percentiles. The basic concept is simple: percentile Pn means n% of all values are <= than the Pn value. If the P95 value = 100ms, then 95% of all values are <= 100ms. In other words: 5% of all values are > 100ms. Percentiles discard the top (100-n)% values as outliers for various reasons which are outside the scope of this page.
